features.title: Professional team headshots in about a minute
features.subtitle: Built for teams and startup founders who need consistent, on-brand photos without the hassle. Perfect for onboarding, team pages, and press kits.

fast.title: 60 seconds, not 6 weeks
fast.description: Teams love this. Each person uploads once and gets results instantly. Your company website and press kit stay current. No more chasing photographers for proofs.

consistency.title: Your brand looks professional, always
consistency.description: New hires no longer break your website's visual consistency. Everyone matches your brand instantly, even when they join mid-Friday afternoon.

control.title: Stop juggling emails and spreadsheets
control.description: Your whole team gets professional photos without you becoming a project manager. One dashboard handles everything, so you can focus on your actual job.

costEffective.title: Save thousands on photoshoots
costEffective.description: Traditional team photoshoots cost $200+ per person and take weeks. Get the same quality for less than a coffee per person. Perfect for startups watching their burn rate and teams with tight budgets.

remote.title: Remote-first by design
remote.description: Built for distributed teams from day one. Set your brand style once, and every new hire-whether they're in San Francisco, London, or their home office-gets consistent photos instantly.

gallery.title: See the magic in action
gallery.subtitle: Real transformations from real users. Upload any photo and watch AI turn your casual selfie into something LinkedIn-worthy in seconds. No Photoshop skills required.

trust.title: Why teams and startups choose TeamShots
trust.subtitle: The only AI headshot service built specifically for B2B teams and growing companies

noWatermarks.title: Your photos, your control
noWatermarks.description: Use your headshots anywhere without worrying about watermarks or licensing. Your website, press kit, LinkedIn‚Äîit's all yours, no strings attached.

instant.title: Instant results
instant.description: Professional headshots in about a minute. Perfect for teams onboarding new hires quickly, or startup founders who need photos yesterday. No scheduling delays.

teamManagement.title: Your team management nightmare, solved
teamManagement.description: No more coordinating schedules or managing vendor relationships. Your team gets professional photos on their timeline, not a photographer's.

costSavings.title: Enterprise savings, startup prices
costSavings.description: Professional team headshots for a fraction of traditional photoshoot costs. Save $200+ per person-essential for startups managing burn rate and teams with budget constraints.

security.title: Enterprise-grade security
security.description: Your team data and photos are encrypted with enterprise-level security. GDPR-compliant, SOC 2 ready. Perfect for teams managing employee data and startups preparing for enterprise sales.

ai.title: Powered by Google Gemini AI
ai.description: Professional results using Google's latest AI technology. Trusted by teams and startup founders who need quality headshots without the traditional photoshoot hassle.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about TeamShots
faq.noResults: No questions found matching your search.

1.question: Is my data secure and private?
1.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and never store your photos permanently. Your photos are automatically deleted 30 days after your subscription ends, or you can request deletion anytime. We don't share your data with third parties-not even your boss, we promise.

2.question: How much does it cost?
2.answer: When you sign up, you get a free test generation in a predefined style so you can see the quality. After that: Try Once package for $5 (2 generations), Individual plan at $24/month (6 generations/month), or Pro plan at $59/month (20 generations/month). Annual plans save you more. Credits never expire, so you can hoard them like digital gold. Each generation uses 10 credits and produces 4 variations.

3.question: What types of photos work best?
3.answer: Any clear photo of your face works! Selfies and casual photos work great. The better quality your selfie, the better quality your result. The less we need to guess, the better.

4.question: Can I use these photos for my LinkedIn, website, etc.?
4.answer: Yes! All generated photos are yours to use for any professional purpose - LinkedIn, company websites, business cards, presentations, and more. You receive high-resolution files (1024x1024px) perfect for any professional use. Go ahead, look amazing everywhere.

5.question: How does the AI photo generation work?
5.answer: Our AI analyzes your uploaded photo using advanced facial recognition and style transfer algorithms (we promise it's not magic, just really smart math). It creates professional headshots by applying corporate photography styles while maintaining your unique facial features and identity-yes, you'll still look like you, just more polished.

6.question: How many photos do I get per generation?
6.answer: Each generation produces 4 different professional variations of your photo. You can download all of them and choose your favorites. This gives you options for different contexts or preferences-serious LinkedIn, friendly website, you get the idea.

7.question: Do you support team photos or just individual headshots?
7.answer: Currently, we focus on individual professional headshots. Each person needs to upload their own photo for the best results (but hey, at least they don't all need to be in the same room). We're working on team photo capabilities for future updates, because group shots are hard.

8.question: How long does it take?
8.answer: About 60 seconds per person. Upload your selfie, and you'll have professional headshots ready in under a minute. No waiting weeks for a photoshoot.

9.question: Will the photos look professional and real?
9.answer: Yes. Our AI maintains your unique features while applying professional photography styles. You'll still look like you, just polished and professional. See the gallery above for real examples.

pricing.variationsBullet: Regenerate up to {count} times to perfect each photo

freeGen.question: Do I get a free generation?
freeGen.answer: Yes. New accounts receive 1 free test generation in a predefined style so you can see the quality. Each generation uses 10 credits and produces 4 variations.

howCreditsWork.question: How do credits work?
howCreditsWork.answer: Each photo generation uses 10 credits and produces 4 high-quality variations. Credits roll over month-to-month and never expire.

topUp.question: Can I top up credits?
topUp.answer: Yes! Subscribers can purchase additional credits at any time. Pricing varies by tier.

satisfaction.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
satisfaction.answer: Every photo includes 2-4 regenerations depending on your plan, so you can refine the results until they're perfect. That's why we offer a free test generation in a predefined style when you sign up - try it first, no obligations.
